text: Ivan Krajčírik (born 15 June 2000) is a Slovak professional footballer who plays for Ružomberok as a goalkeeper. ==Club career== Krajčírik made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Ružomberok against ViOn Zlaté Moravce on 14 October 2017.RUŽOMBEROK VS. ZLATÉ MORAVCE 1 - 1 14.10.2017, soccerway.com ==References== ==External links== * MFK Ružomberok official profile * Futbalnet profile * * Ligy.sk profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:MFK Ružomberok players Category:Slovak Super Liga players
title: Ivan Krajčírik
